```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse) # load libraries


congressage_raw <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fivethirtyeight/data/refs/heads/master/congress-demographics/data_aging_congress.csv") # load the dataset
head(congressage_raw)


ggplot(congressage_raw, aes(x = age_years, y = party_code)) +  # create a simple plot
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "Age vs Party")
```
